TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWin32Window

summary.span: 提供一个用于公开 Win32 HWND 句柄的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在公开 Win32 HWND 句柄的对象上实现此接口。This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles. 可以使用 Win32 API 调用使用生成的句柄。The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls. ## Examples 下面的示例设置的属性`label1`与当前的`Form1`。The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 此示例假定你拥有称为`Form1`与调用`label1`上它。This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取由实施者表示的窗口句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.

value.span: 由实施者表示的窗口句柄。

span.span: A handle to the window represented by the implementer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具体取决于实施者的值属性可以更改窗口的生命周期内。Depending on the implementer, the value of the property could change during the life of the window. ## Examples 下面的示例设置的属性`label1`与当前的`Form1`。The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 此示例假定你拥有称为`Form1`与调用`label1`上它。This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
